creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: large open vaulted space with pointed arches; timber ceiling; altar at L; figures scattered through space
inscription:
Inscription

on back of mount, in pencil in a later hand: [del Cavalotti]
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: View of a Church Interior
